description: Map of Minneapolis mounted on foam core and placed in an acrylic red frame with clear back; shades of red enamel cover map and frame except for a small area at center; one mounting hole at each corner.
inscription: Inscribed verso on clear acrylic in black marker at bottom: Dear Frank: / Next time I see you we do this. /  Paint the town Red! Best of luck / Your pal James
provenance: The artist, Los Angeles, Calif., 1991-', given to Gaard; Frank Gaard, Minneapolis; given to MIA ,1995.
signed: Verso on foam core in black marker at center and ULC : #57 (arrow up) / \"Minneapolis\" 1991 / (18 5/16\" x 15 15/16\") / James Hayward
title: Minneapolis
